li.title: Addition:
li.p: If a, b, and c are any numbers, then (a + b) + c = a + (b + c).

li.title: Multiplication
li.p: If a, b, and c are any numbers, then (a\cdot b)\cdot c = a\cdot (b\cdot c).

li.title: Addition:
li.p: If a and b are any numbers, then a + b = b + a.

li.title: Multiplication
li.p: If a and b are any numbers, then a\cdot b = b\cdot a.

assemblage.title: Distributive Law
assemblage.p: a(b + c) = ab + ac for any numbers a, b, and c.

li.title: Addition:
li.p: If a = b and c is any number, then a + c = b + c.

li.title: Subtraction:
li.p: If a = b and c is any number, then a - c = b - c.

li.title: Multiplication
li.p: If a = b and c is any number, then a\cdot c = b\cdot c.

li.title: Division
li.p: If a = b and c is any nonzero number, then \frac{a}{c} =\frac{b}{c} .

assemblage.title: Fundamental Principle of Fractions
assemblage.p: If a is any number, and b and c are nonzero numbers, then \displaystyle{\frac{a\cdot c}{b\cdot c}= \frac{a}{b}}.

assemblage.title: Product Rule for Radicals
assemblage.p: If a and b are both nonnegative, then \sqrt{ab}=\sqrt{a}\sqrt{b} .

assemblage.title: Zero-Factor Principle
assemblage.p: If ab= 0 then either a= 0 or b=0 .
